title.rendered: True Me | Our New Favourite Styler

content.rendered:
Introducing True Me….A Professional Grade Styler without the hefty price tag.

Developed by the inventive people who originally founded GHD and Cloud Nine, True Me is the next generation of heat styling tools. And we are sure you can imagine that these people know a thing or two about creating a perfect hair styling iron – but this time they are doing things a bit differently.

After being in the pipeline for a while, the team from True Me have stuck to their goal of designing a product that is truly the best on the market, and we are proud to now be stocking them in salon and online.

True Me are dedicated to promising you a great hair day over a “good” hair day and this is how:

  • True Me has an RRP of $179. When we said it was a professional grade iron without the price tag, we meant it.
  • Smart Plate Technology: True Me’s Smart Plate Technology will take your hair from good to great every time. As a professional-grade styler, the Keratin-infused ceramic plates of your True Me Original have been developed with ion-lock technology that results in a shiner, longer-lasting finish in less time. The plates are designed so that they slide through your hair to give it a super-smooth look.
  • Temperature Control: Allows you to turn up (or down) the heat. For those who like to be a bit creative as they style, there is a 360 degree swivel cord that will keep you from getting in a tangle.
  • Protective Heat Guard: Allows you to travel with your True Me and store it on any surface.
  • Hibernation Mode: Automatically switches off your True Me after 20 minutes of inactivity – for true piece of mind.
  • 3-Year Warranty: For the ultimate confidence booster.
  • Navy and Rose Gold Aesthetics 

True Me Original

The power-packed True Me Original is a professional grade iron with all the best technology and features to help you achieve your hair goals, in less time (and with an even shinier finish). Developed by the original founders of GHD and Cloud Nine, this styler will turn ‘good hair days’ to great.

 

True Me Wide

Designed to tame even the wildest of manes with its extra wide plates, the True Me Wide is a professional grade styler with all the latest-and-greatest features and technology to help you achieve an #onpoint look, every time. Developed by the original founders of GHD and Cloud Nine, this styler will turn ‘good hair days’ to great.
